statements: SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment;
SELECT project_name, construction_area FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment;
SELECT impact_description FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment ORDER BY construction_area ASC;
SELECT project_name, impact_description FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment WHERE construction_type = 'Residential' ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment ORDER BY project_name DESC, construction_area ASC;
SELECT project_name, construction_type FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment WHERE construction_area > 1000;
SELECT impact_description FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment WHERE project_name ILIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment WHERE construction_type IS NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, construction_area FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment WHERE impact_description LIKE '%important%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessment;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM environmental_impact_assessment ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, location FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT MAX(start_date) AS latest_start_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_report WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, location FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_report WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE location LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT report_id, assessment_date, findings FROM environmental_impact_report ORDER BY assessment_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT eia.project_name, eir.report_id, eir.findings FROM environmental_impact_assessment eia JOIN environmental_impact_report eir ON eia.project_id = eir.project_id ORDER BY eia.project_name, eir.findings
SELECT * FROM construction_projects;
SELECT project_name, location, end_date FROM construction_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessor_name, impact_score FROM impact_assessments WHERE impact_score > 80;
SELECT project_name, location FROM construction_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM construction_projects WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT project_name, location, assessment_date, impact_score FROM construction_projects JOIN impact_assessments ON construction_projects.project_id = impact_assessments.project_id;

SELECT a.project_name, b.assessor_name, c.detail_description, c.detail_value FROM construction_projects a JOIN impact_assessments b ON a.project_id = b.project_id JOIN assessment_details c ON b.assessment_id = c.assessment_id;
SELECT * FROM environmental_consultants;
SELECT consultant_name, consultant_email FROM environmental_consultants;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM construction_projects;
SELECT project_id, report_date, report_text FROM environmental_impact_reports;
SELECT * FROM project_locations;
SELECT * FROM environmental_consultants;
SELECT consultant_id, consultant_name FROM environmental_consultants ORDER BY consultant_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_text FROM environmental_impact_reports WHERE project_id = 12345 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM project_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, location FROM construction_projects;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT team_lead, team_member FROM project_teams WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT assessment_date, assessment_result FROM assessments WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM construction_projects;
SELECT project_name, location FROM construction_projects ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.project_name, e.factor_name, a.assessment_result FROM construction_projects p JOIN environmental_impact e ON p.project_id = e.project_id JOIN assessments a ON p.project_id = a.project_id;
SELECT p.project_name, t.team_lead, t.team_member FROM construction_projects p JOIN project_teams t ON p.project_id = t.project_id WHERE t.team_lead = 'John Doe';
